item.description:
It feels good to be fit and healthy & to look great (yes?), especially with Spring & Summer around the corner, when you can finally put away the winter clothes.

If you are groaning & feel the need for deprivation, willpower & discipline to lose weight,
what do you think about “allowing” easy weight loss in a way that is also lasting & fulfilling?
Hope it's YES! YES! YES!

If so, get on the call on Monday night, from 8 pm - 9 pm.  The call-in number will be sent to you Monday, so check your e-mail!

Learn:

  • "Unattractive" myths to debunk about losing weight
  • How to let go of the guilt & self-judgments around your weight & eating habits.
  • What makes the difference between easy & difficult weight loss – and it’s not about eating & exercise or counting calories!
  • How your mistakes are the keys to your success
  • How the "Law Of Attraction" strategies for losing weight are also what will bring you greater overall happiness & success in other areas you care about, too!

The call is going to be packed with transformational information, including a guided motivation activation to get you out of your current rut and on an aligned path towards the body you desire.  Have a pen and paper ready!

Call-in number is: 1-218-339-4600
Access code: 488095#
(please call in a few minutes early as we'll begin promptly at 8:00)

Tele-Etiquettes for everyone's enjoyment on the call:
1. Preference is to use a regular land phone rather than a cell or mobile phone.
2. Be in a quiet place, away from "happy" background noises - pets, kids, tv etc.
3. Identify yourself when you share.
4. Actively participate.  :-)

If you’re sick & tired of struggling with your weight & how it feels, AND trying to change the hard way;
and YAY! ready for taking the “downstream”, easy approach to the body & you that you desire, RSVP YES!

Check this out (time sensitive):

The Boston Law of Attraction meetup organizers persuaded me to give their members a whopping 25% discount on my upcoming Inner Way Weight Loss program, starting April 2nd; so of course I am extending this offer to you now, as well!  You must sign up by Wed, 3/27, midnight. Learn more here: http://www.newpossibilitiescoaching.com/inner-way-weight-loss.html
item.how_to_find_us: Call in # will be sent to you after you RSVP, be sure to check your e-mail!

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Surprise tele-meetup! How to lose weight the LoA way - with ease and joy!
